name: Aave Borrow sUSD Strategy
description: Lends {{token}} on [AAVE](https://app.aave.com/home) to gain interest and accumulate staked AAVE as rewards. Also borrows sUSD which it then deposits into the sUSD yVault for yield. Rewards from vested AAVE and yvSUSD are harvested, sold for more {{token}}, and re-deposited into the vault.
